results.name: a(n) = n minus (carryless base-2 product of run lengths in binary representation of n) = n - A284579(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10922
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
xref: Cf. A227190, A284560, A283972 for similar sequences.
Differs from A227190 for the first time at n=56, where a(56)=51, while A227190(56)=47.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 14 2017
